infos.value: *Pant* *pant* *pant*
*Pant* *pant* *pant*
I see through you. You yet hold back your full strength.
That would be my line.
...Why must we do this?
Did we not spend our childhoods learning the way of the spear? Together?
I would have hoped that we shared the same ambitions...
You and I are worlds apart. That is the truth of it.
N-no, it isn't!
There's still time. If we act now, together...
You would have me die a dog's death, is it? Like Corello did?
Serjes...
Corello.... What happened to your brother was regrettable indeed.
But that—
"That" is a stain upon the royal family—spurious infighting in the name of succeeding the throne.
You still believe yourself blameless...?
But I never wanted the throne—
You understand nothing!!
If the king's blood truly runs through your veins, then do not dare turn tail! Harden your resolve!
...Serjes.
This is what you get for keeping your back turned to fate.
Do you understand?
You must either inherit the throne...or be crushed by it.
Such are the two paths laid out before you. There are no others.
You have practiced my father's words well.
I would rather you do not equate me to that man.
...A shame, it is, that you have yet to grasp even one single thing.
May the whole damned royal family burn to ashes.
And let us end this petty notion that you and I were ever childhood friends.
